paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In total, 18.4% (49/267) of P/LP variants affected the BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: The c.-39-1_-39del variant is expected to disrupt an acceptor site in intron 1.

variants.segregation_data: Not assessed due to lack of segregation analysis.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical significance classification.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is rarely included in commonly used targeted gene panels.
key_quotes: Out of interesting findings, we can note a c.-39-1_-39del variant located outside the 5′UTR region of BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted from the main text.
